meta_text: YI SNYING PO BSDUS DON TZAM ZHIG ZIN BRIS SU BKOD PA_Notes that Capture Just the Very Essence of Extensive Advices granted at the Great Monastery of Trashi Hlunpo in the Fire Dog Year [1766] by His Holiness the Panchen Lama, King of the Dharma, the High and Holy Lobsang Pelden Yeshe, Good and Glorious One, to More than Three Thousand Holders of the Canon, on the Subject of the Classical Text known as the ‘The Commentary on Valid Perception’_PAN CHEN BLA MA SKU PHRENG GSUM PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES (1738-1780)
